sections.heading: Overview
content:
Paul Wolf, MD, is a clinical professor of pathology at the University of
California, San Diego and the San Diego VA Medical. The former director of
clinical laboratory at Stanford University Medical Center, Wolf received his
medical degree from the University of Michigan School of Medicine and did his
residency at Wayne State University Hospitals in Detroit.
